Title: Automated Backups Verification
Description: In NinjaOne: Check Dashboard > Backup Tab. Ensure all 'Last Backup' dates are within 24hrs. Set up a 'Backup Failure' alert policy to automate this card's completion.

Title: OS & App Update Checks
Description: In NinjaOne: Go to Patch Management. Ensure 'Critical' and 'Security' patches are approved for auto-deployment. Check for 'Failed' status in the Patch Dashboard.

Title: AV / EDR Scan Status
Description: In NinjaOne: Use the Antivirus dashboard. Verify that the 'Protection' status is green for all endpoints. Audit 'Threats Detected' in the last 24h.

Title: System & Security Log Review
Description: In NinjaOne: Check 'Activities' and 'Events'. Filter for 'Critical' or 'Error' severity. Look for unusual login patterns or multiple failed sudo/admin attempts.

Title: Air-Gapped Backup Verification
Description: Manual Check: Ensure off-site/offline storage (immutable cloud or physical drive) has successfully synced. Perform one test file restoration to verify integrity.

Title: File & Folder Permission Audit
Description: In NinjaOne: Run a script to report on local 'Administrators' or 'Root' group members. Ensure no unauthorized users have gained elevated privileges.

Title: Email Security Review (SPF/DKIM/DMARC)
Description: Use an external tool (like MXToolbox) to verify domain health. Check NinjaOne alerts for any SMTP failure notifications if monitoring mail servers.

Title: MFA Enforcement & Verification
Description: Audit your Identity Provider (Azure AD/Okta/Google). Ensure 100% MFA enrollment. In NinjaOne, check for users without local MFA enabled where applicable.

Title: Anti-Ransomware Verification
Description: In NinjaOne: Verify 'Install/Monitor' state for Ransomware protection tools. Ensure 'Rollback' features (if using VSS/EDR) are active on all drives.

Title: Password Manager Audit
Description: Verify all team members have logged into the company password manager recently. Rotate any shared administrative passwords used for service accounts.

Title: Hardware Security Key Validation
Description: Physical check: Ensure YubiKeys are functional and registered. In NinjaOne, check if 'Security Key' is required for tech logins.

Title: Physical Security Review
Description: Verify screen lock timers are enforced via NinjaOne Policy (General Settings > Security). Check that camera/mic privacy LED policies are active.

Title: Phishing Awareness Validation
Description: Run a simulated phishing campaign. Review the 'Failure Rate' and assign remedial training to users who clicked suspicious links.

Title: AI Threat Monitoring Status
Description: Review EDR/XDR logs for 'Heuristic' or 'Behavioral' detections that were automatically mitigated. Refine AI sensitivity to reduce false positives.

Title: Cyber Insurance Review
Description: Review current policy requirements. Ensure all 'Conditions of Coverage' (like EDR or 3-2-1 backups) are being met by your NinjaOne configuration.

Title: Router & Network Firmware
Description: Check 'Network Devices' in NinjaOne. Look for SNMP alerts regarding firmware versions. Schedule reboots for any pending updates.

Title: Anti-Theft Verification
Description: Ensure 'Find My Device' or 'LoJack' services are active. In NinjaOne, verify 'Location Services' are reporting for mobile/laptop assets.
